title: Sever stability
body:
Did the OCE servers just go down for anyone else
im kind of scared {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
Hey Legal Lemon,

The server went down for regular maintenance. You can follow the latest updates on the Service Status page, linked below!

http://status.leagueoflegends.com/?en_AU#oce

> [{quoted}](name=Wuks,realm=NA,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=tBEjuQwM,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-11-23T19:51:32.949+0000)
>
> Hey Legal Lemon,
> 
> The server went down for regular maintenance. You can follow the latest updates on the Service Status page, linked below!

thanks man
